mapper.update: update filter_rule_conf set FILTER_RULE_IDS = #{filterRuleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where FILTER_RULE_CONF_ID = #{filterRuleConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select FILTER_RULE_CONF_ID, FILTER_RULE_IDS, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from filter_rule_conf where FILTER_RULE_CONF_ID = #{filterRuleConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select FILTER_RULE_CONF_ID, FILTER_RULE_IDS, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from filter_rule_conf
